name: VR Solar System Traveler
description:
This is an exploration game. Players will drive a spacecraft to explore the universe, gather resources, and use the collected resources to recharge the base.

Game Features
Free-to-operate world, this is your unique space. You can explore all the scenes freely in the game.
There are real simulation scenes, through high-precision modeling.
In the game, you can drive in the wilderness and immerse yourself in the passion of speed.
You can also explore in the spacecraft and observe this technological scene.
Work hard to gather resources to ensure that you can keep sufficient resources in this silent deep space.

Instructions:
Menu
*Left and right controllers menu keys (X)
* Trigger button interacts with the menu
* Touchpad/thumbstick(up and down) on the left controller can replace the scroll bar for scrolling

Character
*Movement: touchpad/thumbstick of the left controller
*Steering: steering with right controller
*Jump: trigger button of the right controller

MKⅡ
*Movement: touchpad/thumbstick(up and down) on the left controller control the vehicle to descend and rise
*Steering: touchpad/thumbstick(left and right) on the right controller
*Acceleration: Right controller trigger button
*Hover: Right controller side button
